title: Falling inflation and rising sales fuel hope for a brighter 2024 as experts predict the UK will avoid a recession despite grim figures showing the economy shrank by 0.1% this ...
description: Revised official data this week showed the UK's gross domestic product fell 0.1 per cent between July and September, putting the country on the brink of recession.

title: Net migration likely to rise before next election

title: The £38,000 salary cap will not come into force until 2025, admits Rishi Sunak
description: THE £38,000 salary cap will not come into force until 2025, the PM admitted last night. Ministers quietly watered down the hike from £18,000 on Wednesday – sparking anger from Tory MPs. In

title: Rishi Sunak accused of being 'weak' by Tory MPs after watering down plans to crack down on requirements for workers bringing family into Britain
description: The Prime Minister, who was branded 'weak' by his own MPs after the Home Office appeared to water down the policy, said his Government were 'doing exactly as we said we were doing it'.

title: Family visa earnings threshold will not be imposed in full until 2025 – Sunak
description: Rishi Sunak has said plans to hike the earnings threshold for Britons bringing family members to Britain will not be fully imposed until 2025 after the announcement came under fire.

title: James Dyson: UK must focus on growth not inflation
description: Businessman praises the policies of Truss and Kwarteng in interview with The Telegraph, as Britain teeters on the brink of recession

title: UK could be in recession after economy shrinks
description: The UK just got closer to falling into an official recession – after new figures showed the economy shrank in the third quarter of the year. Rishi Sunak insisted the country had done better than some European neighbours – but he admitted “of course we want to see more growth”.

title: Manchester City beat Fluminense 4-0 to win FIFA Club World Cup
description: Manchester City have become the fourth English team to win FIFA's Club World Cup after a 4-0 win over Brazilian side Fluminense in Saudi Arabia.

title: Politics latest: Rishi Sunak questioned about family visa changes after Home Office climbdown

title: Rishi Sunak says family visa salary threshold will rise in 2025 following anger from Tory MPs
description: Rishi Sunak has said the higher threshold for a family visa will rise in 2025 after he came under fire from Tory MPs for rowing back on plans to introduce it next spring.

title: Bloke due to be unemployed this time next year spotted building up favours

title: New pressure to cut interest rates as UK economy falters and US inflation dips

title: Rishi Sunak announces earning threshold hike will not come into place until 2025
description: Rishi Sunak has announced that plans to hike the earnings threshold for bringing family members to Britain will not be fully imposed until 2025 after the announcement came under fire. The Prime Minister said the minimum salary requirement would still be raised to £38,700, but conceded the hike would be "phased" in over the next year, despite anger from some Tory MPs about the rowback.

title: Michelle Mone Should Be Kicked Out Of The House Of Lords, Says Keir Starmer

description: The naturalist, best known for presenting Springwatch and Blue Planet Live, said he felt ‘hugely let down’ by Rishi Sunak’s move to postpone policies

title: 'Lots of MPs are hopping mad': Anger from Tory right over Sunak's family visa climbdown

title: Dead Ringers - 22nd December
description: Topical satire, featuring all the people you’d least like to have Christmas dinner with. There are debut appearances from Baroness Mone, Katherine Jenkins and the new Doctor Who, Ncuti Gatwa. Sunak and King Charles give their end of year speeches, and there is a surprise guest on Naked Attraction.

title: Huge Lancaster fire burning for weeks finally put out

title: Scottish skipper among three Britons arrested after £96m of cocaine seized on boat
description: Three Britons, including a skipper from Stornoway, have been arrested after the French navy intercepted a boat where they seized 1.2 tonnes of cocaine worth £96m.

title: Bloke due to be unemployed this time next year spotted building up favours
description: The Labour Party is currently odds-on favourites with the bookies to win the next general election, which is due to take place in 2024, at an average of 1/8.

title: Jeremy Hunt remains optimistic amid looming economic recession
description: Revised figures show gross domestic product shrank by 0.1% for July to September after previous estimates indicated growth had flatlined, the Office for National Statistics found.

title: Rishi Sunak says Richmond barracks could be used to house Afghan refugees
description: Rishi Sunak said he hopes to use a military base in his North Yorksire constituency to house Afghan refugees. The Prime Minister on Friday confirmed the Home Office had assessed Catterick Garrison in Richmond as unsuitable for a large asylum facility, following reports first published by the Times.

title: Princess Anne reveals the Queen’s fears about dying

title: Rishi Sunak says family visa salary threshold will rise in 2025 following anger from Tory MPs
description: Rishi Sunak paid a visit to the headquarters of Lincolnshire and Nottinghamshire Air Ambulance where he met with emergency workers. It comes as the prime minister said he hopes to use a military base in his constituency to house Afghan refugees after it was reported he had scrapped plans to accommodate asylum seekers on the site.

title: Sunak warns of migrant threat as UK and Italy agree to fund Tunisia plan
description: The UK and Italy will jointly finance a plan to return migrants in Tunisia to their home countries, as Prime Minister Rishi Sunak warned of the threat of migration to “overwhelm” European states. Mr Sunak used a gathering of Italian conservatives and ...
